description:
Lira recalls Alyssa`s early days with baby Viola. An elfin merchant comes to visit Alyssa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Majo no Ikuji no Aruaru Jijou / Otouto Position no Ren`ai Jijou
The Commonplace Circumstances of the Witch`s Child-Rearing / The Romantic Circumstances of the Little Brother Position
魔女の育児のあるある事情 / 弟ポジションの恋愛事情
